   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Modeling Tropical Cyclone Intensity
=================================================

This library enables analysis of tropical cyclone intensity with an extreme value framework (`tc_extremes` module) or by calculating theoretical potential intensity using climate modeling data (`tc_potential` module).

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   tc_potential
   tc_extremes
